title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson all cosy in topless selfie
text:
These two love a selfie (Picture: Miley Cyrus, Cody Simpson, Instagram)

Miley Cyrus just couldn’t keep her hands to herself in her latest cosy selfie with new boyfriend Cody Simpson.

In what basically looks like an underwear campaign shoot, the smitten couple are seen pulling their best pouts while showing off their new tattoos.

As Miley rests her hand on Cody’s shoulder, the Australian swimmer leaves his shirt open to reveal a fresh grim reaper tattoo complete with a scythe.

He cryptically captioned the selfie ‘death do us’, a cheeky play on his grim reaper ink but also possibly his future plans to settle down with Miley.

You know ‘til death do us part’ aka marriage vows.

Meanwhile the popstar proved her dedication to rock n roll by getting a heart with a dagger through the middle and the words ‘rock n roll heart’ written on a scroll.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It comes hours after Cody sparked rumours they had moved in together, when he took a selfie in his new digs with the caption: ‘Move in day.’

Marriage vows? (Picture: Cody Simpson, Instagram)

Their new romance is going from strength to strength despite only being a few weeks old, and Miley’s rep made the rare move of releasing a statement with an update about their relationship.

In the message shared with People, Miley’s manager Matt Zeidman said the couple are ‘sober’ and focusing on their relationship and work commitments.

‘It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realise.

‘Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they’re both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me,’ he said.

Miley began dating Cody, 22, shortly after her split from Kaitlynn Carter whom she dated for two months following the end of her marriage to Liam Hemsworth.

Hunger Games actor Liam has now moved on with Dynasty actress Maddison Brown. The pair went public with their romance last week when they were spotted showing all the PDA while on a date in New York City.

MORE: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson ‘sober’ now after meeting during ‘wilder phases’ before romance
description: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson have posed for yet another topless selfie to show off their new tattoos.
